problem_text_cn: 如图,CE平分∠BCD且CE⊥BD于点E,∠DAB=∠ABD,AC=24,△BCD的周长为34,则BD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, CE bisects ∠BCD and CE ⊥ BD at point E, ∠DAB = ∠ABD, AC = N_0, △BCD's perimeter is N_1, then the length of BD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵CE平分∠BCD且CE⊥BD于点E,∴△DCB是等腰三角形,∴DC=CB,∵∠DAB=∠ABD,∴AD=DB,∵AC=AD+DC=DB+DC=24,∵△BCD的周长=DC+DB+CB=34,∴CB=34-24=10,∴DC=10,∴BD=24-10=14,故选:C．
